description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Do you love water? Do you need it to live? Yaystuff quenches your thirst...to relax. When you're done putting the pedal to the metal, saving the world and blowing stuff up - load up Ambient Water. Relax and recharge. Maybe even take a nap. Come back fresh and frosty.
description.short: Do you love water? Do you need it to live? Yaystuff quenches your thirst...to relax. When you're done putting the pedal to the metal, saving the world and blowing stuff up - load up Ambient Water. Relax and recharge. Maybe even take a nap. Come back fresh and frosty.
